news_header: Viking Line is searching for a new CEO as current CEO Jan Hanses plans to resign in 2026 amid declining passenger demand and financial results.
news_text: Viking Line has announced that it will begin the search for a new CEO as Jan Hanses, who has held the position since 2014, will resign next year and serve as a senior advisor until his retirement in April 2026. The company reported a significant decrease in net sales to EUR 370.6 million for January-September, down from EUR 3..2 million the previous year, with an operating result of EUR 25.2 million, a 50% decline from last year. The drop in passenger demand and changing consumer habits are cited as major factors contributing to these financial challenges.
